text: Beauty Palace is a 1990 Indian Malayalam film, directed by VG Ambalam, starring Shakeela and Ravichander in the lead role. ==Cast== * Alekya * Brinda * Mervin * Shaarika * Shakeela * Ravichander * Hari * Raja Bahadoor ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Beauty Palace
